snippet: The Broadway actress’s 1934 Cortlandt Manor, N.Y., home underwent extensive renovations after she bought it last year.
abstract: Actress Julie White loves the 1934 Cortlandt Manor, NY, cottage she brought back from disrepair, where she likes to spend time making homemade ice cream and meals inspired by her Texas childhood.
lead_paragraph: The Broadway actress’s 1934 Cortlandt Manor, N.Y., home underwent extensive renovations after she bought it last year.

headline.print_headline: Cottage Sticks Out Foot, Trips Actress
